attributes.action: Allow gyms to open on 4th July
attributes.additional_details: The government is over looking the fitness and leisure industry. Fitness improves health which strengthens the immune system which will then help fight the coronavirus. The government needs to reconsider their decision and open up the gyms as soon as possible. If it's safe to open bars, pubs,restaurants, barbers and cinemas surely its safe to open up the gyms.
attributes.background: Fitness improves health which strengthens the immune system which will then help fight the coronavirus. Fit and healthy people are less likely to catch the coronavirus. The gyms have posted videos on social media showing the members and the government that it's safe and Covid secure.

rejection.details: Since you started your petition gyms have been allowed to reopen. You can read the Government's announcement about the reopening of gyms here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-announces-gyms-and-pools-to-reopen-safely
